home.heroDescription: Born from our struggle at TextCortex AI to fairly reward our top performers, MergeMint uses AI to automatically evaluate every merged pull request—scoring contributions by severity and impact. Finally, an objective way to recognize excellence and automate your bug bounty program.
home.securityDescription: Your data security is our top priority. MergeMint is built on 100% EU infrastructure with enterprise-grade security certifications.
home.securityEuInfraDesc: All data is processed and stored exclusively in the European Union. No data ever leaves EU borders.
home.securityGdprDesc: Full compliance with EU General Data Protection Regulation. Your data, your rights.
home.securitySoc2Desc: Independently audited security controls covering availability, confidentiality, and processing integrity.
home.securityIso27001Desc: International standard for information security management systems. Best-in-class security practices.
home.securityEncryptionDesc: All data encrypted in transit and at rest using AES-256 encryption.
home.securityPrivacyDesc: We never sell your data. Minimal data collection with transparent policies.
home.storyP1: At TextCortex AI, we knew who our star performers were—the developers who consistently shipped critical bug fixes, tackled the hardest problems, and moved the product forward. But when it came time for bonuses and recognition, we hit a wall.
home.storyStruggle1: Manual PR reviews took 20+ hours per week
home.storyNeeded2: Automatic scoring on every merged PR
home.storyNoSolution: We looked for existing solutions—but found nothing that automatically evaluated PR impact using AI. So we built MergeMint.
home.storyResult: Today, every merged PR at TextCortex gets automatically evaluated by Claude. Our team knows exactly how their work is valued, bonuses are calculated objectively, and our top performers finally get the recognition they deserve. We're now open-sourcing MergeMint so you can solve the same problem.
home.testimonialsTitle: Trusted by engineering teams solving the same problems
home.testimonialsDescription: From TextCortex AI to startups and enterprises—see how teams are using MergeMint to recognize great work.
home.howItWorksDescription: No more manual spreadsheets or subjective reviews. MergeMint connects to GitHub and automatically evaluates every merged pull request using Claude AI.
home.howItWorksStep1Desc: Install the MergeMint GitHub App on your organization. Takes less than 2 minutes.
home.howItWorksStep2Desc: Developers work as usual. When a PR is merged, MergeMint gets notified via webhook.
home.howItWorksStep3Desc: Claude analyzes the diff, classifies the component and severity, and calculates a score.
home.howItWorksStep4Desc: Scores feed into dashboards. Developers see their impact. PMs track quality metrics.
home.featuresDescription: Built for engineering managers, PMs, and developers who are tired of manual PR reviews and want to measure and reward impact objectively.
home.featureAIDesc: Claude analyzes PR diffs, linked issues, and commit messages to classify severity and component automatically.
home.featureLeaderboardsDesc: Real-time rankings by total score, PR count, or average impact.
home.featureGitHubDesc: One-click GitHub App installation with webhook-driven PR processing.
home.featurePRCommentsDesc: MergeMint posts detailed evaluation comments directly on every merged PR.
home.featureAnalyticsDesc: Track team velocity, quality index, and contributor trends.
home.featureSelfHostedDesc: Run MergeMint on your own infrastructure. Keep all data behind your firewall.
home.prCommentDescription: MergeMint comments on every merged PR with a breakdown of the score, eligibility checks, and impact analysis. Developers know exactly how their work is valued.
home.productInsightsDescription: Go beyond developer metrics. Understand where your product is evolving, identify bug hotspots, track feature ownership, and spot knowledge silos before they become problems.
home.componentAnalyticsDesc: See which parts of your product are getting the most attention, where bugs are concentrated, and how work is distributed.
home.bugHotspotsDesc: Identify components with the most P0/P1 bug fixes
home.featureOwnershipDesc: Know who owns each feature area
home.severityTrendsDesc: Track bug vs feature ratio over time
home.atRiskDesc: High bugs + low eligibility = needs attention
home.openSourceDescription: We solved our own problem at TextCortex AI, and now we're open-sourcing it for everyone. Self-host it, fork it, contribute to it. Free for non-commercial use under CC BY-NC 4.0.
home.useCasesDescription: Whether you're struggling with fair compensation, performance reviews, or contributor recognition—MergeMint has you covered.
home.useCase1Problem: Manually tracking PR impact is time-consuming and subjective
home.useCase1Solution: Automate scoring and payouts with AI-powered evaluation. Every contribution is measured objectively.
home.useCase2Problem: Hard to quantify developer contributions during review cycles
home.useCase2Solution: Pull objective metrics for 1:1s, promotions, and compensation decisions. No more guesswork.
home.useCase3Problem: Star developers go unnoticed while others take credit
home.useCase3Solution: Real-time leaderboards and public recognition for those who ship the most impactful work.
home.creatorBio: Built MergeMint to solve our own recognition problem—because every developer deserves fair recognition for their work.
home.ctaDescription: Join TextCortex AI and hundreds of engineering teams who've solved the recognition problem.
home.ctaSubtext: Setup takes 5 minutes. Free for non-commercial use. Open source and self-hostable.

features.heroDescription: MergeMint combines AI evaluation, configurable scoring, and beautiful dashboards to turn every merged PR into actionable insights.
features.heroSubtext: Built at TextCortex AI to solve our own recognition problem. Now open source for everyone.
features.corePlatformDescription: The fundamental building blocks that power MergeMint's PR intelligence.
features.aiEvaluationDescription: Claude analyzes every merged PR—reading the diff, understanding the changes, and classifying the impact automatically.
features.configurableDescription: Define your own scoring system. Set multipliers per component, base points per severity, and custom eligibility criteria.
features.dashboardsDescription: Beautiful, data-rich dashboards for PMs and developers. See scores, trends, and leaderboards at a glance.
features.leaderboardsDescription: Gamify contributions with real-time leaderboards. Track weekly MVPs, top PRs, and cumulative scores.
features.prCommentsDescription: MergeMint posts detailed evaluation comments directly on GitHub PRs, giving developers instant feedback.
features.profilesDescription: Each contributor gets a profile page showing their score history, PR breakdown, and contribution patterns.
features.githubDescription: MergeMint integrates seamlessly with GitHub through a secure GitHub App. Automatic webhook processing, no manual work required.
features.githubWebhookDesc: Instant processing when PRs are merged
features.githubDiffDesc: Full access to PR diffs and file changes
features.githubIssueDesc: Detects linked issues from PR descriptions
features.githubCommentsDesc: Posts evaluation results as PR comments
features.scoringDescription: Every team is different. Configure MergeMint to match your specific needs.
features.componentDefinitionsDesc: Define the components of your product and assign multipliers based on complexity or business importance.
features.severityLevelsDesc: Configure severity levels with base points. The AI will classify each PR based on the impact of the changes.
features.productInsightsDescription: Go beyond developer scores. Get deep visibility into product development patterns, identify problem areas, and make data-driven decisions about your roadmap.
features.componentAnalyticsDescription: Track which parts of your product are getting the most development attention and where work is distributed.
features.bugHotspotsDescription: Identify components with the most P0/P1 bug fixes to focus quality improvement efforts where they matter most.
features.featureOwnershipDescription: Know who owns each area of your codebase. See primary contributors and ownership percentages for every component.
features.knowledgeSilosDescription: Spot single-contributor components before they become problems. Proactively manage bus factor risk.
features.severityTrendsDescription: Track the bug vs feature ratio over time. Understand if your team is in maintenance mode or shipping new value.
features.atRiskDescription: Combine multiple signals to identify components that need attention: high bugs, low eligibility, and poor quality scores.
features.productInsightsCalloutDesc: Product Insights transforms raw PR data into actionable intelligence. Know where your team is spending time, identify bottlenecks, and ensure no critical areas are neglected.
features.productInsightsCallout1: Identify expertise gaps in your team
features.changelogDescription: Keep your users informed with beautiful, AI-generated changelog pages. Turn merged PRs into user-friendly release notes with a single click.
features.aiGenerationDescription: Claude analyzes your PRs and generates user-friendly changelog entries automatically, categorizing them by type.
features.aiGenerationFeature1: Detects feature vs bug fix vs improvement
features.draftPublishDescription: Generated entries start as drafts. Review, edit, and publish when ready. Full control over what goes public.
features.publicPageDescription: Beautiful, hosted changelog page at your custom URL. Share product updates with your users and stakeholders.
features.smartCategoriesDescription: Entries are automatically categorized into New Features, Improvements, Bug Fixes, and Breaking Changes.
features.timelineDescription: Entries are grouped by month with a beautiful timeline design. Users can easily browse your product history.
features.customSettingsDescription: Configure your changelog to match your brand. Control what information is displayed and how it appears.
features.changelogCalloutTitle: From PR to changelog in seconds
features.changelogCalloutDesc: Stop manually writing release notes. MergeMint reads your PRs, understands the changes, and generates polished changelog entries that your users will actually want to read.
features.changelogCallout1: Generate entries from multiple PRs at once
features.changelogCallout3: Share your public changelog URL anywhere
features.selfHostDescription: MergeMint is fully open source. Self-host it on your own servers for complete control over your data and customization options.
features.yourInfraDesc: Deploy on any cloud or on-premise
features.dataSovereigntyDesc: All data stays behind your firewall
features.ctaDescription: Set up MergeMint in under 5 minutes. Free for open source projects.

pricing.heroDescription: MergeMint is open source and free to self-host. We also offer a hosted version with additional features and support.
pricing.proDescription: Hosted in EU with enterprise security
pricing.proTrialNote: 14-day free trial. No credit card required.
pricing.ossDescription: If you're maintaining an open source project, MergeMint Pro is completely free. We believe in giving back to the community that makes our work possible.
pricing.faq1Answer: An active developer is anyone who has had at least one PR evaluated in the current billing period. Developers who don't contribute don't count toward your limit.
pricing.faq2Answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. When upgrading, you'll be charged a prorated amount. When downgrading, the new rate applies at your next billing cycle.
pricing.faq3Question: Do I need my own Anthropic API key?
pricing.faq3Answer: For self-hosted installations, yes—you'll need to provide your own API key for Claude. The hosted Pro plan includes AI credits.
pricing.faq4Question: Is my code sent to the AI?
pricing.faq4Answer: Yes, PR diffs are sent to Claude for evaluation. If this is a concern, you can self-host and use your own API key with enterprise-grade data handling agreements.
pricing.faq5Question: What happens if I exceed my developer limit?
pricing.faq5Answer: We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit. New PRs will still be processed, but we'll ask you to upgrade to continue.
pricing.ctaDescription: Get started in minutes. No credit card required for the free trial.

howItWorks.heroDescription: MergeMint automates the entire flow from PR merge to developer recognition. Here's exactly how it works.
howItWorks.heroSubtext: No more manual spreadsheets like we used to do at TextCortex AI. Just automatic, AI-powered evaluation.
howItWorks.step1Description: Install the MergeMint GitHub App on your organization. Select which repositories you want to track. The setup takes less than 2 minutes.
howItWorks.step1Feature1: Read access to code and pull requests
howItWorks.step2Description: Define the components of your product (e.g., Auth, Payments, UI) and assign multipliers based on importance. Set up severity levels with base points.
howItWorks.step3Description: Developers work as usual. When a pull request is merged, GitHub sends a webhook to MergeMint with the PR details.
howItWorks.step4Description: MergeMint fetches the full diff and sends it to Claude. The AI analyzes the changes, classifies the component and severity, and checks eligibility criteria.
howItWorks.step4Feature1: Reading PR title, description, and linked issues
howItWorks.step4Feature3: Matching file paths to component rules
howItWorks.step5Description: MergeMint posts a detailed comment on the PR with the evaluation results. The developer gets instant feedback on their contribution.
howItWorks.step6Description: The score is recorded in the database. Leaderboards update in real-time. PMs and eng leads can track team performance and recognize top contributors.
howItWorks.ctaDescription: Get started in under 5 minutes. Free for open source projects.

faq.heroDescription: Everything you need to know about MergeMint. Can't find what you're looking for? Feel free to reach out.
faq.cat1A1: MergeMint is an open-source platform that uses AI to automatically evaluate and score pull requests. It helps engineering teams run bug bounty programs, recognize top contributors, and measure developer impact objectively.
faq.cat1A2: When a PR is merged, MergeMint fetches the diff and sends it to Claude (Anthropic's AI). The AI analyzes the changes, classifies the affected component and severity level, checks eligibility criteria (issue linked, tests, documentation), and calculates a score using your configured multipliers.
faq.cat1Q3: How long does it take to set up?
faq.cat1A3: Most teams are up and running in under 5 minutes. You install the GitHub App, select which repositories to track, and configure your scoring rules. MergeMint starts processing new PRs immediately.
faq.cat1A4: Yes! MergeMint includes a backfill feature that lets you process PRs from before you installed the app. This is great for establishing baseline scores and historical leaderboards.
faq.cat2Q1: How is the final score calculated?
faq.cat2A1: The formula is: Final Score = Base Points (from severity) × Multiplier (from component). For example, a P1 severity fix (50 base points) in the Auth component (1.5× multiplier) would earn 75 points.
faq.cat2A2: MergeMint checks four criteria: (1) Is this fixing an issue/bug? (2) Does the implementation actually fix what it claims? (3) Is the PR properly documented? (4) Are tests included? PRs that fail eligibility still get evaluated but score 0 points.
faq.cat2Q3: Can I customize the components and multipliers?
faq.cat2A3: Absolutely! You define your own components (e.g., Auth, Payments, UI) and assign multipliers based on complexity or business importance. You can also set up file path rules to auto-classify PRs.
faq.cat2Q4: How accurate is the AI classification?
faq.cat2A4: In our testing, Claude correctly classifies component and severity ~90% of the time. You can review and override any evaluation if needed. The AI provides justification for its decisions to help you understand its reasoning.
faq.cat3Q1: What GitHub permissions does MergeMint need?
faq.cat3A1: MergeMint needs read access to code and pull requests (to analyze diffs), and write access to issues (to post evaluation comments). We only access repositories you explicitly enable.
faq.cat3Q2: Does MergeMint work with GitHub Enterprise?
faq.cat3A2: Yes, MergeMint supports GitHub Enterprise Server. For self-hosted installations, you'll need to configure the GitHub App with your enterprise domain.
faq.cat3Q3: Can I disable the PR comments?
faq.cat3A3: Yes, PR comments are optional. You can disable them globally or per-repository while still collecting scores in the dashboard.
faq.cat3Q4: Does MergeMint support GitLab or Bitbucket?
faq.cat3A4: Currently, MergeMint only supports GitHub. GitLab support is on our roadmap. Bitbucket support depends on community interest.
faq.cat4Q1: Is my code sent to the AI?
faq.cat4A1: Yes, PR diffs are sent to Claude (Anthropic) for evaluation. If this is a concern, you can self-host MergeMint and use your own Anthropic API key with enterprise-grade data handling agreements.
faq.cat4A2: Yes! MergeMint is open source under CC BY-NC 4.0. You can deploy it on your own infrastructure for non-commercial use. For commercial use, please contact us for licensing options.
faq.cat4A3: MergeMint stores PR metadata (title, author, file list, diff snippets), evaluation results (scores, classifications), and aggregated statistics. We don't store your full codebase.
faq.cat4A4: The hosted version is SOC 2 Type II compliant. For self-hosted deployments, compliance depends on your infrastructure. We provide security best practices documentation.
faq.cat5A1: MergeMint is free for non-commercial use under CC BY-NC 4.0. Self-host it for personal projects, education, or open source. For commercial use, contact us for licensing.
faq.cat5Q2: Is there a free tier for the hosted version?
faq.cat5A2: We offer a 14-day free trial of Pro, and the hosted version is completely free for open source projects. Contact us to apply for the OSS program.
faq.cat5Q3: Do I need my own Anthropic API key?
faq.cat5A3: For self-hosted installations, yes—you'll need to provide your own Anthropic API key. The hosted Pro plan includes AI credits.
faq.cat5A4: Yes, you can export all your data (PRs, evaluations, leaderboards) in CSV or JSON format. You own your data.
faq.contactDescription: We're here to help. Reach out through GitHub or contact us directly.
